updateAuthor: UPDATE author SET name = '%s', login = '%s', email = '%s' WHERE id = '%s'
updateTest: UPDATE test SET name = '%s', status_id = '%s', method_name = '%s', project_id = '%s', session_id = '%s', start_time = '%s', end_time = '%s', env = '%s', browser = '%s', author_id = '%s' WHERE id = '%s'
